file_content.text: Good fight, soft skin. My pack will hunt the other prisoners for you.
I have shamed my pack. We await your Imperial slave drivers.
I've proven my strength. Now serve the Empire. Help us keep the other alien prisoners in line.
You have shamed my pack in the eyes of the Scorekeeper. But the fight was fair. We will serve.
If even one of you disobeys, your entire pack will be punished.
See that you do.
Prove your strength against the other aliens, and your goddess will take notice.
You can redeem your honor.
You're pathetic.
Captain Vandorn. The Trandoshans have agreed to police the aliens.
Magnificent! I'll send troops to make sure those scaly fiends obey.
Fit the lizards with shock collars. If they step out of line, light them up.
Enslave this scum.
Chain us if you must. We are bound to obey.
Ssevrek displayed great honor today. His pack will serve us best without your interference.
Show them respect.
I am honored by your kindness. We will dedicate ourselves to your cause.
Smart lizard. With those scoundrels on our side, we'll have this wing secure in no time.
I'm sending an Imperial team out to toss their base and search for contraband. I'll keep you in mind if anything turns up.
Meanwhile, you're needed in the maximum security wing. I hear Operations Group Three's managed to awaken one of Belsavis's sleeping monstrosities there.
Help Colonel Grang contain whatever broke loose. The Empire would appreciate it. Vandorn out.
Meanwhile, we need you on the trail of the Dread Masters. The Republic took them into the maximum security wing. Our operations groups followed.
All I know is they woke one of Belsavis's sleeping monstrosities. Colonel Grang will brief you on the details. Vandorn out.
Meanwhile, we need you on the trail of the Dread Masters. The Republic drugged the Sith Lords and took them into Belsavis's deepest cells.
The galaxy's darkest secrets are locked up there. Rendezvous with the other operations groups and contact Commander Calum the second you find anything. Vandorn out.
Meanwhile, I'll transmit my glowing review of your performance to Commander Calum. Vandorn out.
You wounded my pack. Killed our warriors. Now you come to me with blood on your hands.
Defeat this one! For the Scorekeeper! Think of the reward!
Wait. This soft thing deserves my ear.
Flay them. For the Scorekeeper!
Not yet. These soft things earned my ear.
Why do you approach the mighty Ssevrek?
I'm here with an offer. Refuse, and your gang will face my wrath.
To challenge you.
The Empire wants your help. You're going to cooperate with a smile, and I'm going to make you.
To make you bow to the Empire.
The Empire's interested in your services. I'm here to extend an offer.
To propose a deal.
Powerful people want your help. Consider this a challenge.
To bring you in.
Your gang's more powerful than all the other grunts in this wing. I could use your strength.
Out of respect.
Listen, scale-face, I could take down your entire gang in my sleep. I'll prove it, too.
You don't look so mighty.
Fight me, and you get a chance to defeat the greatest prey on Belsavis. But if I win, your pack must agree to serve the Empire.
Ha! A fearless one. I will enjoy crushing you.
If you win, we kneel. But if you lose, Ess Al takes a trophy.
The nose! No--the hand!
Any final words, soft skin?
Any final words, soft skins?
Let's do this, Ssevrek.
I'm ready.
Your goddess isn't going to be happy when I beat you.
You're going to regret this.
We have killed hundreds. You will join them.
At least give me a snack. Something tasty. Oh, and a strong drink.
No last meal?
Foolish soft thing. Enough!
Watch us, Scorekeeper!
